Ibelata akara ụkwụ bụ mkpọsa nkè Chọọchị England iji belata akara carbon ya.
Ọ bụ Bishọp nke London, Dr Richard Chartres na-eduzi mkpọsa ahụ ma malite ya na World Environment Day na June 2006 na oku ka ụka niile mee nyocha ike na arụmụka gbasara ike

A na-ahụ nke a dị ka nzọụkwụ mbụ iji nweta 'Ulo uka pasenti iri abụọ' na-ebelata ikuku carbon site na ọrụ, ihe owuwu na usoro Chọọchị ruo pasenti iri abụọ nke ọkwa dị ugbu a site n'afo 2050, n'ụzọ kwekọrọ na aro nke Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change.
Mgbasa ozi ahụ na-agbaso mkparịta ụka n'afọ 2005 General Synod nke dugara n'ọkpụkpọ òkù màkà Chọọchị ka ọ tinye aka na nsogbụ mgbanwe ihu igwe na ojiji ike.
